author: Megan Armstrong
title: NBCSN to Re-Air Iconic 'Sunday Night Football' Games During Coronavirus Pandemic
description: NBC Sports  announced  on Wednesday that NBC Sports Network will air two iconic  Sunday Night Football  games per night beginning on Monday and lasting through Sunday, April 5.  The program will be called  Football Week in America  and start at 7 p...
content:
Bill Sikes/Associated Press
NBC Sports announced on Wednesday that NBC Sports Network will air two iconic Sunday Night Football games per night beginning on Monday and lasting through Sunday, April 5.
The program will be called Football Week in America and … [+1309 chars]
